import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Header2 from './../layout/header2'; import Footer1 from './../layout/footer1'; import Bottom from './../element/bottom'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from '../layout/sidebar'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' // import { Row, Col, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' function Wallet() { const wallet = useSelector(state => state.wallet.wallet) const [irt, setIrt] = useState(undefined) const [usdt, setUsdt] = useState(undefined) useEffect(() => { setIrt(wallet.filter((item, idx)=> item.service.name === "IRT")) setUsdt(wallet.filter((item, idx)=> item.service.name === "UDST")) }, []) return ( <>
